title: Finding the Spirit: A Tale of Strangers, Scavenging and Scarves
description: The Muppet Killers: Holiday Greetings Facebook Friends, Feeling like the Grinchiest Grinch of them all this Christmas? Looking for something to reboot your love for Yuletide time fun? Well, hereâ€™s your chance to embark on some old-fashioned adventure and rekindle your love of winter and all things red, white and green. The concept is simple. The tasks not so much. Meet us this Eve and partake in resounding joy! Cue the chance meeting of Reece Moore and Sydney Fletcher, two city kids from different sides of the tracks, and their whirlwind adventure as they deal with all the curve balls Christmas Eve has to offer, including crazy friends, hot homeless guys and cool indie bands.
author: T. Howard
